title: What are some good words to use for writing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Linking words, e.g: Cause, thus, accordingly, to the background of, shifting, thus, leading to, subsequently, due to, therefore, as a result, thus, fourth bringing, thence, due to my limited time and energy inof upheaving all words into a Quora answer, I redirect the intrested reader into the Oxford dictionary wordbook for inspiration, and this handy webpage for your exams: https://www.dlsweb.rmit.edu.au/lsu/content/4_WritingSkills/writing_tuts/linking_LL/linking3.html And may you have a joyful writing time!
Rather than looking for words, consider using an active voice throughout your writing. It will sound confident and persuasive. Also remove unnecessary words. When it comes to writing, less is more.
